thread.section_title: Deposit a Gift Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Deposit a Gift | depositagift.com
thread.title: LaMont
thread.title_full: Deposit a Gift reviewed by LaMont

author: LaMont
title: LaMont
text:
So far, there has been extremely slow activity on the page....almost niche. I do not feel that we (Bill Traylor Family Foundation) conveyed the right message.... our story telling skills did not imply a sense of urgency or explain explicitly why the donor should donate to our cause.
Since BTFF is a novice at this....we do not know what else Deposit a Gift could have done other than provide the vehicle for the message to get out to the media.
